package.name: activo_categoryurlseo
package.summary: Flattens the SEO structure of your entire catalog.
package.description: This FREE SEO Friendly Categories extension lets you flatten your URL structure by using only the last subcategory name in the URL. So instead of mystore.com/category/subcategory1/subcategory2/subcategory3 you will have just mystore.com/subcategory3 in your URL.
package.notes: Complete rewrite. Using less overwrites. No more rewrite URL with numbers at the end for products - issue fully resolved!
